message.content:
cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.AR, cs.ET

Reasoning: 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is the most likely category as the paper proposes an extension of the AFDX standard to homogenize avionics communication architecture, which involves networking and internet architecture.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also likely as the paper deals with mixed-criticality avionics applications, which require control and monitoring systems.
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is another possible category as the paper discusses the specifications and performance analysis of the proposed solution, which involves software engineering principles.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is a possible category as the proposed solution may require hardware modifications to incorporate the TSN/BLS shaper.
- cs.ET (Embedded Systems) is another possible category as the proposed solution is intended for avionics applications, which typically involve embedded systems.
